mapper.select: select re.id as "id", re.req_num as "reqNum", date_format(re.issue_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as "issueTime", re.contract_amount as "contractAmount", re.req_name as "reqName",re.req_phone as "reqPhone", re.req_email as "reqEmail",re.req_detail as "reqDetail", re.contract_amount as "financingAmount", re.actual_loan_amount as "actualLoanAmount", re.financing_period as "financingPeriod", re.expected_date as "expectedDate", re.result_detail as "resultDetail", re.is_comment as "isComment", info.con_name as "conName",info.con_phone as "conPhone", info.con_email as "conEmail",re.org_name as "orgName", re.advisor_name as "advisorName", re.product_name as "productName", ra.attitude_score as "attitudeScore", ra.evaluation_desc as "evaluationDesc" from tb_service_require re left join tb_service_org_info info on re.org_id = info.org_id left join tb_service_rating ra on ra.id = re.id where re.record_status = '1' and re.id = #{id};
